title: [GAMEPLAY] Jinx - laugh does not work like other champions
body:
Jinx's laugh doesn't work like other champs. I understand it's programmed to loop into the same animation once she's on the ground, but because of this, **she won't ever start laughing until you wait like 3 seconds** while standing still and not within auto attack range of anything. 
**The first part of the loop should at least go on even if you don't wait through the animation.**

Because of this, you'll pretty much NEVER hear the laugh. For a champ whose identity is being bats*** crazy, it's strange seeing her always play silent, cold and calculating. Even on ARAM, there's no goofing around with her. I just played her a lot since she was free week, but never being able to laugh in funny situations feels weird. I'd buy her instantly if she worked normally.

PLEASE, fix her!!

replies.body:
Hey! 

As it is now, the laugh hooked up to allow it to loop, which means it's not spammable (and doesn't start immediately). In a perfect world (and tech permitting), you'd be able to have both a spammable emote, and an infinite laugh loop. So, currently, this is working as intended. she is a bit older, and when she was made, that was the extent the tech could function. Not sure if said limitations are still in place, but it couldn't hurt to look.

Yes - I play {{champion:222}} a ton and can never laugh anymore - I feel like BEFORE.. it wasn't an issue (like a few patches ago maybe) - but then suddenly I remember not being able to laugh as easily or having to really stand behind my creeps and wait first
